note:
Reader, grumbler, baker, eater of cheese, cruncher of crackers. I try to make the world suck less & that isn't always easy. Statements are anti-establishment.

If I didn't like winter I wouldn't live in Alaska. I don't have enough time to read all the books or cook all the things, but I do like to make time for others.

I've been online since the era of the BBS. If you're reading this, we possibly first "met" on Usenet.

fields.name: Twitter
fields.value: http://twitter.com/thc1972

fields.name: Running Toward
fields.value: Have you met me? I'm not a runner.
